_comment: BLINK evaluation configuration - Example settings for evaluating TheWorld on BLINK benchmark
_note_tasks: Comma-separated list of BLINK tasks to evaluate
_note_num_samples: Set to integer (e.g., 100) for quick test, null for full dataset
_note_num_world_steps: Comma-separated for ablation study (e.g., '0,4' compares without/with world tokens)
_note_output: Path to save evaluation results JSON
_note_save_errors: Include incorrect predictions in results for analysis
